data.event: The town gained political status as a self-governing municipium, maybe as early as 338 BC, but certainly by the middle of the 1st century BC.

event.title: describes Ameria as a flourishing place in 80 BC

data.event: Cicero's speech in defence of Sextus Roscius Amerinus describes Ameria as a flourishing place in 80 BC, with a fertile territory extending to the Tiber.
